summary: The diff implements all three requirements: fixing photo upload errors, renaming the application to 'Mofongo Tracker', and adding banner photo customization functionality. The implementation includes new components, hooks, backend methods, and UI updates that align with the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Community Reviews page and related functionality
hallucinated_features.reason: The diff includes community review features (getAllReviews, CommunityReviewCard, reaction system with addReaction/removeReaction, useReactions hooks) that were not requested in the BuildRequest. The requirements focused only on photo upload fixes, renaming, and banner customization.
The backend includes 'officialRecommendations' state and related functionality that was not part of any requirement in the BuildRequest.
